scripts.new:view:
node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const name = process.argv[1]; const dir = `app/view/${name.toLowerCase()}`; fs.mkdirSync(dir, { recursive: true }); fs.writeFileSync(`${dir}/index.html`, `
Welcome to ${name} view
`);"
scripts.new:scss: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const name = process.argv[1]; fs.writeFileSync(`app/src/css/themes/${name.toLowerCase()}/${name.toLowerCase()}.scss`, `/* SCSS for ${name} theme */\n`);"
